DESCRIPTION.message: உங்கள் கேமராவைப் பயன்படுத்தி, படங்களை எடுக்கலாம், வீடியோக்களை ரெக்கார்டு செய்யலாம்.
DESCRIPTION.description: Short description of the Camera App.

ERROR_MSG_FILE_SYSTEM_FAILED.description: Error message shown when failing to read or write the file system.

ERROR_MSG_NO_CAMERA.message:
உங்கள் கேமரா தற்போது கிடைக்கவில்லை.
அது சரியாக இணைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளதா எனச் சரிபார்க்கவும்.
ERROR_MSG_NO_CAMERA.description: Error message shown when it was impossible to connect to the camera due to unavailability.

ERROR_MSG_GALLERY_EXPORT_FAILED.description: Error message shown when exporting to an external directory failed. Expects a file name to be passed in.

ERROR_MSG_SAVE_FILE_FAILED.description: Error message shown when saving/adding a image or video to the file system failed.

ERROR_MSG_TAKE_PHOTO_FAILED.description: Error message shown when failing to take photo.

ERROR_MSG_RECORD_START_FAILED.description: Error message shown when failing to start recording video.

ERROR_MSG_EMPTY_RECORDING.description: Error message shown when no data is recorded for a recording and it won't be added to the gallery.

STATUS_MSG_RECORDING_STOPPED.description: Status message for spoken feedback when video recording has been stopped.

STATUS_MSG_CAMERA_SWITCHED.description: Status message for spoken feedback when switching over to another camera.

GALLERY_IMAGES.description: Text to speech label for the gallery list.

GRID_TYPE_BUTTON.description: Label for the button of grid-type options.

TIMER_DURATION_BUTTON.description: Label for the button of timer-duration options.

ARIA_GRID_3X3.description: Label for spoken feedback to read out grid-type: 3x3.

ARIA_GRID_4X4.description: Label for spoken feedback to read out grid-type: 4x4.

TAKE_PHOTO_BUTTON.description: Label for the shutter button to take photo.

TAKE_PHOTO_CANCEL_BUTTON.description: Label for the shutter button to cancel countdown timer and stop taking photo.

RECORD_VIDEO_START_BUTTON.description: Label for the shutter button to start recording.

RECORD_VIDEO_STOP_BUTTON.description: Label for the shutter button to stop recording.

SWITCH_CAMERA_BUTTON.description: Label for the button to switch to next connected camera. Eg. switching from front facing to back facing, or a camera connected via USB. The button is shown only when more than one camera is connected.

SWITCH_RECORD_VIDEO_BUTTON.description: Label for the button to switch to record video mode.

SWITCH_TAKE_PHOTO_BUTTON.description: Label for the button to switch to take photo mode.

TOGGLE_TIMER_BUTTON.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the countdown timer.

TOGGLE_MIRROR_BUTTON.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the preview mirroring. Eg. if mirroring is toggled on, preview will be flipped horizontally.

TOGGLE_GRID_BUTTON.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the grid shown on preview.

TOGGLE_MIC_BUTTON.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the microphone for recording video.

DIALOG_OK_BUTTON.description: Label for the accepting button in the dialog.

DIALOG_CANCEL_BUTTON.description: Label for the dismissing button in the dialog.

DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MSG.description: Confirmation message before removing a selected item from the gallery. Expects a file name to be passed in.

DELETE_MULTI_CONFIRMATION_MSG.description: Confirmation message before removing multiple selected items from the gallery. Expects a file count to be passed in.

MIGRATE_PICTURES_MSG.message:
கேமராவில் எடுக்கப்படும் படங்களும் வீடியோக்களும் ‘பதிவிறக்கங்கள்’ கோப்புறைக்கு நகர்த்தப்படும். அவற்றை ‘Files’ என்பதில் பார்க்கலாம்.

சேமிப்பக அனுமதிகள் உள்ள ஆப்ஸால் உங்கள் படங்களையும் வீடியோக்களையும் அணுக முடியும்.
MIGRATE_PICTURES_MSG.description: Message shown before moving all photos and videos stored in the Camera App to the Downloads folder.
